posts.title: Myfirst
posts.text: code test12345678910111213141516171819202122232425//Solidity定义的函数默认为public。设置为私有需添加关键字 privatefunction eatHamburgers(string _name, uint _amount) {}//私有函数，这意味着只有我们合约中的其它函数才能够调用这个函数function eatHamburgers(string _name, uint _amount) private {}//return 设置函数的返回值function sayHello() public returns (string) { return greeting;}//函数修饰符view，意味着函数只能读取数据不能更改数据function sayHello() public view returns (string) {}//函数修饰符pure，表明这个函数不访问应用里的数据function _multiply(uint a, uint b) private pure returns (uint) { return a * b;} Algoblockstrade(无信息) 1https://www.algoblocks.io/ FinanceChainge 123https://www.chainge.finance/https://chainge.app/
